  • Field Details

    • inventory

      private final HashMap<Product,Integer> inventory
      This maps each product to the quantity available at this shop/warehouse. If a certain product does not exist in this map, then it is implied that its quantity is zero at this shop/warehouse.

    • zipcode

      private Integer zipcode
      The zipcode where this shop/warehouse exists.

  • Method Details

    • getZipcode

      public Integer getZipcode()
      Getter method for the zipcode
      Returns:
      The zipcode of this shop/warehouse

    • setZipcode

      private void setZipcode(Integer zipcode)
      Setter method for the zipcode that is accessible only from within the ShopWarehouse class so that those who use the class cannot modify the zipcode intentionally or otherwise.
      Parameters:
      zipcode - The zipcode for this shop/warehouse

    • addProduct

      public void addProduct(@NotNull @NotNull Product product, @NotNull @NotNull Integer quantity)
      Add a product to this shop/warehouse's inventory with the specified quantity.
      Parameters:
      product - The product to be added
      quantity - The quantity of the product to be added

    • removeProduct

      public void removeProduct(@NotNull @NotNull Product product)

    • getInventory

      public Map<Product,Integer> getInventory()
      Get the inventory of this shop/warehouse.
      Returns:
      An immutable view of the inventory (product->quantity) map of this shop/warehouse.

    • fulfillOrder

      public void fulfillOrder(@NotNull @NotNull Order order) throws InvalidOrderException
      This method decrements the quantity of a certain product that is available in the inventory based on the order.
      Parameters:
      order - The order object containing information about the order placed.
      Throws:
      InvalidOrderException - When the shop/warehouse does not possess the required quantity of the product as demanded by the order.
